attributes.action: prevent any further housing development within a band 10 miles either side of the A14 between Huntingdon and Newmarket until such time as the A14 and feeder roads have been given the capacity to cope with the volume of traffic and as an interim measure to restrict HGV vehicles to use of the nearside lane only.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local users of the A14 and roads from surrounding towns and villages are subjected to daily journeys that are subject to delays as a result of the failure to improve the road infrastructure to meet the needs of those who use the roads.
